shelters.name: Bellevue Homeless Haven
shelters.description: Bellevue Homeless Haven provides emergency shelter services for homeless individuals and families, offering meals, a safe place to sleep, and access to support services and resources for finding permanent housing.

shelters.name: East Washington Women's Shelter
shelters.description: Dedicated to serving women and children, the East Washington Women's Shelter offers accommodations, health services, and programs to empower women in the community to achieve independence.

shelters.name: Bellevue Youth Outreach Center
shelters.description: Focusing on the needs of homeless youth, this center provides a safe and supportive environment with resources aimed at education, employment, and transitioning to stable living conditions.
